661955.effect:
You can discard this card; add 1 "Cipher" monster from your Deck to your hand. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 "Cipher" Xyz monster you control; attach this card to that target as material. You can only use each effect of "Cipher Wormhole Elder" once per turn. An Xyz Monster that has this card as material gains this effect.
? Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; Set 1 "Cipher" or "Tachyon" Trap from your Deck or GY to your Spell & Trap Zone, then, if that card was Set from your GY, banish that card when it leaves the field.
661955.name: Cipher Wormhole Elder

662008.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Cipher Wing" from your Deck, but you cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Cipher" monsters. When your opponent targets a "Cipher" Xyz monster you control with a card effect (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your GY,then target 1 "Cipher" Xyz monster you control; that monster is unaffected by card effects during this Chain. You can only use 1 "Cipher Horror" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
662008.name: Cipher Horror

661971.effect: If you control a "Cipher" Xyz monster: Target 1 card your opponent controls; banish that target, then if that card was not banished, your opponent must banish another card on their field, if possible. You can only activate 1 "Cipher Cyclone" per turn.
661971.name: Cipher Cyclone

1693621.effect:
2+ Level 5 Zombie monsters
You can also Xyz Summon "VampopStar Song: Blue Rose Of Fluttering Saddness" by using 1 face-up Pendulum Summoned "VampopStar" monster as material, and if you do, this card ATK becomes equal to that monster's original ATK. If this card is Xyz Summoned using 2 or more monsters as material: It gains 1000 ATK for each monster used as this card material. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card; send 1 monster on each player field to the GY. If a monster is sent from the field to the GY: The ATK of all monsters that player currently control loses equal to that monster's original ATK until the End Phase. You can only use each effect of "VampopStar Song: Blue Rose Of Fluttering Saddness" once per turn.
1693621.name: VampopStar Song: Blue Rose Of Fluttering Saddness
1693621.treated_as: VampopStar Song: Blue Rose Of Fluttering Saddness

1692877.effect:
2+ Level 5 Zombie monsters
You can also Xyz Summon "VampopStar Song: Flamming Prisoner Of Love" by using 1 face-up Pendulum Summoned "VampopStar" monster as material, and if you do, this card ATK becomes equal to that monster's original ATK. If this card is Xyz Summoned using 2 or more monsters: It gains 1000 ATK for each monster used as this card material. Once per turn: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 other face-up monster on the field; while that target is face-up on the field, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects, and if that target leaves the field, you can Special Summon that monster to your field, but banish this card when that monster leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "VampopStar Song: Flaming Prisoner Of Love" once per turn.
1692877.name: VampopStar Song: Flaming Prionser Of Love
1692877.treated_as: VampopStar Song: Flaming Prionser Of Love

1691747.effect:
2 "VampopStar" monsters
During each Standby Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "VampopStar" monster that is banished or face-up from your Extra Deck. Once per turn: You can send 1 "VampopStar" monster face-up from your Extra Deck to the GY; add 1 "VampopStar" monster from your Deck to your Extra Deck face-up. You can only use each effect of "VampopStar's Backstage" once per turn.
1691747.name: VampopStar's Backstage

1696651.effect: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Nermusa, The Crazy Alchemist" from your Deck to your hand. "Nermusa" Fusion Monster cannot be targeted by card effects the turn they are Fusion Summoned. You can only activate 1 "Nermusa Altar" per turn.

1696645.effect: If you control no monsters, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). You can only Special Summon "Nermusa, The Crazy Alchemist" once per turn this way. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Essence" card from your Deck or GY to your hand. During the End Phase, if this card is in your GY or banished: You can discard 1 card; add this card to your hand. You can only use 1 "Nermusa, the Crazy Alchemist" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

1696676.effect: Tribute 1 "Nermusa" monster; Special Summon 1 "Nermusa, The Dragon Incarnate" from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Fusion Summon.) During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Dragon Essence" per turn.

1696681.effect: Tribute 1 "Nermusa" monster; Special Summon 1 "Nermusa, The Blazing Incarnate" from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Fusion Summon.) During the End Phase, if this card is in your GY: You can Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Fiery Essence" per turn.

1696687.effect:
Tribute 1 "Nermusa" monster; Special Summon 1 "Nermusa, The Sand Incarnate" from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Fusion Summon.) During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Nermusa" Fusion
 monster in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Sand Essence" per turn.

You can only use 1 "Shield Essence" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

1696659.effect: Must first be Special Summoned by the effect of "Fiery Essence". You can only control 1 "Nermusa, The Blazing Incarnate". 1696663.effect: Must first be Special Summoned by the effect of "Dragon Essence". You can only control 1 "Nermusa, The Dragon Incarnate". You can only Special Summon "Nermusa, The Sand Incarnate(s)" once per turn.

1696671.effect: Must first be Special Summoned by the effect of "Shield Essence". You can only control 1 "Nermusa, The Shielding Incarnate". 1699592.effect:
If you control no monsters, or all monsters you control are "Emeraheart" and/or "Plorceress" monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, and if you do, add 1 "Emeraheart" or "Plorceress" monster from your Deck to your hand. For the rest of the turn after this effect resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except Plant and Spellcaster monsters. If an "Emeraheart" or "Plorceress" Xyz monster you control has this card as material, it gains the following effect. 
+ Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Plant monster from your Hand.

1655642.effect:
3+ Plant and/or Spellcaster monsters, including an Xyz and Synchro Monster
(This card is also always treated as an EARTH and a Spellcaster monster.) 
While this card points to a Plant or Spellcaster Synchro monster and a Plant or Spellcaster Xyz monster, this card is unaffected by your opponent's card effects. You can only use the following effects of "Plorceress Fairy Elf Queen Titiana" once per turn.
● If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 "Plorceress" Synchro or Xyz Monster in your GY; This card gains ATK equal to that targeted monster's ATK or DEF (your choice).
● (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card your opponent controls; shuffle it into the Deck, then, if it was a monster, you can Special Summon 1 "Plorceress" monster from your GY. Otherwise, Set 1 "Plorceress" Spell/Trap from your GY directly to your field.
1655642.name: Plorceress Fairy Elf Queen Titiana

1624225.effect: (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card from your hand or field, then target 1 "Yova the Wind Silencer" you control; return it to the hand, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Yova the Silent Dreamer" once per turn.

If this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Yova the Wind Silencer" from your hand or GY. ?Banish 1 card from your opponent's GY, then Special Summon this banished card.
?Add 1 Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand, that specifically lists "Yova the Wind Silencer" in its text.

1624099.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Yova the Wind Silencer", or 1 card that specifically lists "Yova the Wind Silencer" in its text, from your GY to your hand, except "Yova the Silent Child". You can only use 1 "Yova the Silent Child" effect per turn, and only once that turn.

1624355.effect: When a "Yova the Wind Silencer" you own activates its effect: Discard 1 card; Special Summon "Silenced Wind Tokens" (Spellcaster/WIND/Level 4/ATK 1500/DEF 1400) in Defense Position, up to the number of "Yova the Wind Silencer(s)" on your field and/or in your GY. These Tokens are destroyed immediately after the effect of "Yova the Wind Silencer" resolves (or would resolve, if its effect was negated). 1624537.effect: Once per turn, if you Special Summon a monster that specifically lists "Yova the Wind Silencer" in its text, you can activate its effect that would activate if it were Normal Summoned as if you had Normal Summoned that monster. During the Main Phase: You can shuffle 3 of your "Yova the Wind Silencer(s)" and/or cards that specifically list "Yova the Wind Silencer" in their texts that are banished or in the GY into the Deck, and if you do, draw 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Whispers Within the Wind" once per turn.

1624277.effect:
Target 1 monster on the field in the same column as a Spell/Trap your opponent controls; destroy it. ?The equipped monster cannot be destroyed, except by battle, also it gains 600 ATK.

1523787.effect: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; if it is Set, shuffle it into the Deck (even if it is flipped face-up after this card is activated). 1689855.effect: During your Standby Phase: You can place 1 Anti-spell Counter on this card. 1689836.effect: During your Standby Phase: You can place 1 Anti-spell Counter on this card. 1683579.effect:

You take no battle damage involving battles with "Anti-Magic" monsters and monsters that lists Anti-spell Counter on their effects.

(Quick Effect): activate one of those effects:- If your opponent would Summon a Monster that cannot be destroyed by cards effects, cannot be targeted, unnafected by cards effects, or with ATK higher than 5000 ATK, you can banish this card Face-down; Negate that summon, and if you do, Banish that monster, also banish all other copies of that monster from Deck, Graveyard, Hand and Extra Deck, if it's a unnafected by cards effects monster, they cannot be used for the rest of this duel.- Banish this card Face-down, tribute all monsters your opponent control that lists Unnafected by cards effects, Cannot be destroyed by cards effects, cannot be targeted by cards effects, and if you do, banish them.You can only activate this effect of "Anti-Magic Crusher" once per turn.

1594753.name: Variavrains Tentacluster Drillworm

1596098.effect: All "Variavrains" and "Allure Queen" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF. Once per turn: You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Variavrains" monster from your Deck to your hand. Once per turn, if an "Allure Queen" or "Variavrains" monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned to your field: You can target 1 of those monsters; you cannot Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Variavrains" monsters, also Special Summon 1 "Variavrains" monster from your Deck with a different name from that target. You can only activate 1 "Variavrains Crossover Allure Palace" per turn.
1596098.name: Variavrains Crossover Allure Palace

1596119.effect: The first time you would take battle damage from an attack involving your "Variavrains" and/or "Tentacluster" monster each turn, you do not. Once per turn: You can target 1 of your banished "Variavrains" or "Tentacluster" monsters; Special Summon it in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy any monsters Special Summoned by this effect. If this card is destroyed, and is now banished or in the GY: You can banish 1 "Variavrains" or "Tentacluster" monster from your GY; Set this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only activate 1 "Variavrains Crossover Flexible Tentacluster" per turn.
1596119.name: Variavrains Crossover Flexible Tentacluster

1596133.effect: Target 2 "Hellix" or "Variavrains" monsters in your GY with different names; Special Summon them, but their ATK/DEF become 0, their effects are negated, and cannot attack or be Tributed, also they cannot be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz, or Link Summon, except for the Link Summon of a "Hellix" or "Variavrains" monster. You can only activate 1 "Variavrains Crossover Hellix Graveyard Incubation" per turn.
1596133.name: Variavrains Crossover Hellix Graveyard Incubation

1596877.effect: (This card is always treated as a "Dark Mummy" card").Tribute 1 "Dark Mummy" or "Variavrains" monster; Special Summon 3 "Variavrains Dark Mummy Tokens" (DARK/Zombie/Level 1/ATK 100/DEF 0), then, if you Tributed a Link Monster to activate this card, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field. For the rest of the turn after this card is activated, you cannot Summon monsters, except "Dark Mummy" or "Variavrains" monsters. You can only activate 1 "Variavrains Crossover Monster Restich" per turn.
1596877.name: Variavrains Crossover Monster Restich

1596109.effect: Target 1 "Variavrains" or EARTH Link Monster in your GY that was destroyed by your opponent's card this turn and 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; Special Summon 1 "Variavrains G Golem Token" (Cyberse/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0), and if you do, it gains DEF equal to the Link Rating of that target in the GY x 800, also your opponent's monster loses ATK equal to the DEF of that "Variavrains G Golem Token", and it cannot attack monsters, except "Variavrains G Golem Tokens".
1596109.name: Variavrains Crossover Gravity Vision

1597552.effect: When your opponents monster targets your monster for an attack, or when your opponent activates a card or effect that would destroy a card(s) you control: Target another monster or card your opponent controls that would be an appropriate target; that card/effect/attack now targets the new target, then you can Special Summon 1 "Variavrains Hellix Token" (Fiend/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). Until the end of the next turn after this card is activated, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Variavrains" or "Hellix" monsters.
1597552.name: Variavrains Crossover Hellix Regneration Cure

1595593.effect: 2+ "Dark Mummy" and/or "Variavrains" monstersGains 300 ATK for each monster it points to. When you draw a "Variavrains" card(s) or a Zombie monster: You can reveal 1 of them; inflict 500 damage to your opponent. If a monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned, or Set, to a zone an opponent's Link Monster points to (Quick Effect): You can destroy that monster(s), and if you do, destroy 1 monster you control. You can only use each effect of "Variavrains Dark Mummy Surgical Forceps" once per turn.
1595593.name: Variavrains Dark Mummy Surgical Forceps

1595543.effect: 2 "Variavrains", "G Golem", and/or EARTH monstersOnce per turn: You can target 1 EARTH or "Variavrains" Link Monster in your GY; Special Summon it so that it is co-linked to this card, then place 1 G Golem Counter on this card. All EARTH and "Varaiavrains" monsters this card points to gain 600 ATK for each G Golem Counter on this card. If there are 2 or more G Golem Counters on this card, monsters co-linked to this card can attack twice during each Battle Phase. You can only Special Summon "Variavrains G Golem Crystal Heart" once per turn. You can only control 1 Variavrains G Golem Crystal Heart.
1595543.name: Variavrains G Golem Crystal Heart

1595554.effect: 2+ "Variavrains", "G Golem", and/or EARTH Link MonstersWhen this card declares an attack on an opponent's monster: You can send 1 EARTH monster from your hand to the GY; until the end of this turn, that opponent's monster loses 200 ATK, also its effects are negated. When your opponent activates a card or effect that targets a monster(s) you control (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, and if you do, destroy that card. You can only use each effect of "Variavrains G Golem Dignified Trilithon" once per turn.
1595554.name: Variavrains G Golem Dignified Trilithon

1595511.effect: 2+ "Variavrains", "G Golem", and/or EARTH monstersCo-linked monsters you control are unaffected by your opponents monsters effects. Your opponent's monsters must attack this card, if able. If this card attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. When this card you control that was Link Summoned using "G Golem" and/or "Variavrains" monsters you control as Link Material is destroyed: Negate the effects of all face-up cards your opponent currently controls for the rest of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Variavrains G Golem Invalid Dolmen" once per turn.
1595511.name: Variavrains G Golem Invalid Dolmen

1595498.effect: 2 "Variavrains", "G Golem", and/or EARTH monstersYou can pay 1000 LP, then target 1 EARTH or "Variavrains" monster in your GY that can be Normal Summoned/Set; Special Summon it, but negate its effects. You can only use this effect of "Variavrains G Golem Stubborn Menhir" once per turn.
1595498.name: Variavrains G Golem Stubborn Menhir

1596077.effect: 2+ "Variavrains" and/or "Allure Queen" monstersThis Link Summoned card gains 500 ATK for each "Allure Queen" or "Variavrains" monster it points to. Once per turn, when your "Variavrains or "Allure Queen" monster is targeted for an attack, or when your opponent activates a card or effect that targets an "Allure Queen" and/or "Variavrains" monster(s) you control, while "Variavrains Crossover Allure Palace" is in a Field Zone (Quick Effect): You can make that monster unable to be destroyed this turn, then you can destroy 1 monster your opponent controls. You can only use this effect of "Variavrains Golden Allure Queen" once per turn.
1596077.name: Variavrains Golden Allure Queen

1593592.effect: 2 "Variavrains" and/or "Hellix" monstersAt the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: This card's ATK becomes equal to the ATK of that face-up opponent's monster until the end of this turn. The first time this card would be destroyed by battle each turn, it is not destroyed. If this effect is applied, after damage calculation: You can Tribute 1 monster this card points to; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the Tributed monsters ATK on the field. When this card is destroyed by your opponent's card: You can target 1 "Variavrains" or "Hellix" in your GY; Special Summon it. You can only use this effect of "Variavrains Hellix Gothiclone" once per turn.
1593592.name: Variavrains Hellix Gothiclone

1593990.effect: 2 "Variavrains" and/or "Hellix" monstersYour opponent's monsters cannot target this linked card for attacks. If this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card to your zone a "Variavrains" or "Hellix" Link Monster points to, then take 2000 damage. When your opponent activates a card or effect that would destroy a card you control (Quick Effect): You can negate that effect, then this card's ATK becomes double its original ATK for the rest of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Variavrains Hellix Necro Darwin" once per turn.
1593990.name: Variavrains Hellix Necro Darwin

1594855.effect: 2+ "Tentacluster" and/or "Variavrains" monstersWhen this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Variavrains" or "Tentacluster" monster from your hand to your zone this card points to. During the Main Phase: You can target as many monsters this card points to as possible; destroy them, and if you do, Special Summon "Variavrains" and/or WATER Machine monsters from your GY to zones this card points to, equal to the number destroyed by this effect +1. You can only use each effect of "Variavrains Tentacluster Nautilus" once per turn.
1594855.name: Variavrains Tentacluster Nautilus

1332492.effect: You can activate or Set this card (from your hand) as a Continuous Spell. (Its effect as a Continuous Spell is the following effect.) Once per turn: You can discard 1 Spell or 1 "Guildimension" card from your hand; Special Summon 1 "Guildimension" monster from your Deck, except "Guildimension Magic Engineer", to your zone a "Guildimension" Link Monster points to, but for the rest of this turn after this effect resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Guildimension" monsters.
1332492.name: Guildimension Magic Engineer
1332492.pendulum_effect: You can banish 1 Spell from your GY, or banish 1 "Guildimension" monster from your GY or face-up Extra Deck; Special Summon 1 of your "Guildimension" cards from Pendulum Zone.

1353371.effect: You can activate or Set this card from your hand as a Continuous Spell. (Its effect as a Continuous Spell is the following effect.) Once per turn: You can return 1 "Guildimension" card in your Pendulum Zone, or 1 of your other "Guildimension" cards in your Spell & Trap Zone; destroy 1 face-up "Guildimension" card your opponent controls.
1353371.name: Guildimension Violet Sorceress
1353371.pendulum_effect: If you have 2 "Guildimension" cards in your Pendulum Zones: You can add the cards from your Pendulum Zones to your face-up Extra Deck; inflict damage to your opponent equal to the number of "Guildimension" Pendulum Monsters in your face-up Extra Deck x 300. You can only activate this effect of "Guildimension Violet Sorceress" once per turn.

1437001.effect: You can activate or Set this card from your hand as a Continuous Spell. (Its effect as a Continuous Spell is the following effect.) If your "Guildimension" monster in the Main Monster Zone destroys your opponents monster by battle or card effect: You can target 1 of your "Guildimension" Continuous Spells that was originally a Monster Card; Special Summon it, but return it to the hand during the End Phase. You can only activate this effect of "Guildimension Scarlet Savior" once per turn.
1437001.name: Guildimension Scarlet Savior
1437001.pendulum_effect: Once per turn: You can add 1 "Guildimension" monster from your face-up Extra Deck to your hand, but it cannot be Special Summoned this turn.

1437025.effect: You can activate or Set this card (from your hand) as a Continuous Spell, with its effect being its monster effect. You can shuffle up to 3 "Guildimension" monsters from your GY and/or face-up Extra Deck to your Deck, then target that many monsters your opponent controls; destroy them. You can only activate this effect of "Guildimension Verdant Fletcher" once per turn.
1437025.name: Guildimension Verdant Fletcher
1437025.pendulum_effect: You can send 1 "Guildimension" Pendulum monster from your Deck to your face-up Extra Deck, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its Pendulum Scale x 100. You can only activate this effect of "Guildimension Verdant Fletcher" once per turn.

1437087.effect: If this card on the field is sent face-up to the Extra Deck by the effect of a monster you control: Special Summon this card, but banish it if it leaves the field. When your opponent declares a direct attack (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to the face-up Extra Deck, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Guildimension" monster from your GY or face-up Extra Deck in Defense Position, and if you do, gain LP equal to it's Pendulum Scale x 100, but negate that card's effects. You can only activate each effect of "Guildimension Holy Crusader" once per turn.
1437087.name: Guildimension Holy Crusader
1437087.pendulum_effect: Once per turn: If you activate a "Guildimension" monster's effect in the Spell & Trap Zones: Target one of your monsters face-up in the Extra Deck; Add it to your hand.

1464921.effect: You can activate or Set this card from your hand as a Continuous Spell. (Its effects as a Continuous Spell are the following effects.) Once per turn: You can place 1 Deus Counter on this card for each face-up "Guildimension" card. You can send this card with 15 or more Deus Counters to your face-up Extra Deck; destroy all cards your opponent controls. You can only activate this effect of "Guildimension Doomsday Herald" once per turn.
1464921.name: Guildimension Doomsday Herald
1464921.pendulum_effect: Monsters you control gain 100 ATK until the End Phase for every attempted activation of a "Guildimension" card or effect (even if that card or effect did not successfully resolve).

1464859.effect:
(This card is also treated as a DARK Fiend monster.)
When a "Guildimension" monster activates its effect, while you control 1 or more "Guildimension" cards, other than this card (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand to your GY or field to your face-up Extra Deck; negate that effect, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to that monster's original ATK, and gain LP equal to its original DEF, or if a Link monster's effect was negated, gain LP equal to that monster's Link Rating x 500 instead. You can only activate this effect of "Guildimension Divine Duality" once per turn.
1464859.name: Guildimension Divine Duality
1464859.pendulum_effect: All LIGHT and DARK monsters on the field are also treated as "Guildimension" monsters, also other "Guildimension" cards you control cannot be banished by your opponent's card effects.

1445581.effect: When your opponent activates a card or effect that would destroy at least 1 monster you control, while this card is on your field or in your face-up Extra Deck (Quick Effect): You can shuffle this card, and 1 "Guildimension" monster you control, into the Deck; Special Summon 1 Level 8 or lower monster from your Deck, but its effects (if any) are negated if it is not a "Guildimension" monster. You can only activate this effect of "Guildimension Guardian Druid" once per turn.
1445581.name: Guildimension Guardian Druid
1445581.pendulum_effect: If you Pendulum Summon a WIND, WATER, and/or EARTH monster(s) while this card is in your Pendulum Zone, those monsters gain 1000 ATK/DEF (even if this card leaves the field). All WIND, WATER, and EARTH monsters on the field are also treated as "Guildimension" monsters.

1454512.effect: You can activate or Set this card from your hand as a Continuous Spell. (Its effect as a Continuous Spell is the following effect.) If a "Guildimension" monster you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can shuffle 2 Spells and/or "Guildimension" cards from your GY and/or face-up Extra Deck into the Deck instead. You can only use this effect of "Guildimension Spell Swordsman" once per turn.
1454512.name: Guildimension Spell Swordsman
1454512.pendulum_effect: Any "Guildimension" monster Pendulum Summoned with this card in the Pendulum Scale cannot be destroyed by card effects until your opponent's next End Phase (even if this card leaves the field).

1454529.effect: You can Set this card (from your hand) as a Continuous Trap card. (Its effect as a Continuous Trap is the following effect.) If your opponent declares an attack (Quick Effect): You can return up to 2 "Guildimension" cards you control to your hand, then target that many "Guildimension" monsters your opponent controls; destroy them. You can only use this effect of "Guildimension Haunted Slasher" once per turn.
1454529.name: Guildimension Haunted Slasher
1454529.pendulum_effect: (Quick Effect): You can banish up to 2 cards from your Pendulum Zones, then target that many face-up "Guildimension" monsters your opponent controls; destroy them. (This effect cannot be activated when this card is activated in the Pendulum Zone.) You can only activate this effect of "Guildimension Haunted Slasher" once per turn.

1464987.effect: (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your hand; this effect becomes this card's Pendulum Effect when that effect is activated. When this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Guildimension" card from your Deck to your hand. You can target 1 monster you control; return it to the hand, then add 1 "Guildimension" monster to your hand from your Deck or face-up Extra Deck, with a different name from the returned monster. You can only activate each effect of "Guildimension Labryinth's Keeper" once per turn.
1464987.name: Guildimension Labyrinth's Keeper
1464987.pendulum_effect: While your opponent controls at least 5 or more monsters (Quick Effect): You can banish this card; banish all monsters your opponent controls. You can only activate this effect of "Guildimension Labryinth's Keeper" once per turn

1461940.effect: You can Set this card from your hand as a Continuous Trap. (Its effect as a Continuous Trap is the following effect.) When a "Guildimension" card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 card, then target 1 card on each side of the field; negate that effect, and if you do, destroy those targets. During the End Phase: Draw cards equal to the number of "Guildimension" cards destroyed by this effect. You can only use each effect of "Guildimension Bounty Hunter" once per turn.
1461940.name: Guildimension Bounty Hunter
1461940.pendulum_effect: If you Pendulum Summon a monster(s): You can target cards your opponent controls, up to the number of monster(s) you Summoned; send that many cards from your face-up Extra Deck to your GY, and if you do, destroy those targetss. You can only activate the effect of "Guildimension Bounty Hunter" once per turn.

1451599.effect: All face-up cards on the field are also treated as "Guildimension" cards, also any cards that originally have "Guildimension" in their name are sent to the GY instead of the face-up Extra Deck if they are destroyed by battle or card effects. You can destroy 1 "Guildimension" monster you control that was Special Summoned from the face-down Extra Deck, and if you do, Special Summon up to 2 "Guildimension" monsters that are in the GY, banished, or face-up in the Extra Deck. You can only activate this effect of "Guildimension Universal Rift" once per turn.
1451599.name: Guildimension Universal Rift

1464956.effect: If you control no cards, you can activate this card from your hand. If your opponent would reduce your LP to 0: Shuffle all cards that originally have "Guildimension" in their name that are either in the GY, banished, or face-up in your Extra Deck into your Deck (min. 1), and if you do, Special Summon "Guildimension Violet Sorceress" and 1 Level 7 or lower "Guildimension" monster from your Deck in Defense Position. You can only activate 1 "Guildimension Heroes' Scattering" per turn.
1464956.name: Guildimension Heroes' Scattering

1498099.effect:
(This card is always treated as a "Guildimension" card.)
Target 1 "Guildimension" monster you control: Banish it. During your next Standby Phase, return that monster banished by this effect to the field, and it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects this turn. If this card is activated while you control "Guildimension Magic Engineer": You can reveal 1 "Guildimension" monster in your face-down Extra Deck and banish 1 "Guildimension Magic Engineer" you control; Special Summon the revealed monster, but negate it's effects until the end of your opponent's next turn, unless the card Summoned by this effect is "Guildimension Kounat Machina". You can only activate 1 "Kounat Awakening Crystal" per turn.
1498099.name: Kounat Awakening Crystal

1302530.effect:
2+" Guildimension" monsters, including at least 1 "Guildimension Magic Engineer"
Cannot be destroyed by battle while your opponent controls more "Guildimension" monsters than you do. Cannot be destroyed by card effects while you control more "Guildimension" monsters than your opponent. This card gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn every time a "Guildimension" card or effect is activated, except in the Main Monster Zones. If this card battles an opponent's monster: You can double this card's current ATK, and if you do, your opponent takes no battle damage for the rest of this turn. You can only activate this effect of "Guildimension Kounat Machina" once per turn.
1302530.name: Guildimension Kounat Machina

1437055.effect:
"Guildimension Holy Crusader" + 1+ non-Tuner monsters
When your opponent activates a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can target 1 "Guildimension" monster on the field; negate that effect, and if you do, return the targeted monster to the hand, then gain LP equal to half its combined original ATK and DEF. You can only activate this effect of "Guildimension Saintly Paladin" once per turn. If this card leaves the field: You can either place it in your Pendulum Zone or banish it.
1437055.name: Guildimension Saintly Paladin
1437055.pendulum_effect: You can target 1 "Guildimension" monster in your GY or face-up Extra Deck: Special Summon it, and if you do, gain LP equal to its Pendulum Scale x 500. You can only activate this effect of "Guildimension Saintly Paladin" once per turn.

917544.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 "Flamiller Serpent" from your deck or GY to your hand. You can send 1 "Flamiller Serpent" from your hand or field to the GY; Add 1 "Flamiller" Ritual monster from your deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Flamiller Breeder" once per turn.
917544.name: Flamiller Breeder

915339.effect: If there are least 5 cards in your Opponent's GY, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; Equip 1 "Flamiller Serpent" from your deck to that Monster.
915339.name: Flamiller Piper

915343.effect: If there are least 3 cards in your Opponent's GY while you control a "Flamiller" Monster, you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If a Ritual monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or by card effect and sent to the GY: You can discard this card; Special Summon 1 of those Monsters.
915343.name: Flamiller Whisperer

915344.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Flamiller Serpent". Negate the effects of all face-up monsters your opponent controls whose ATK is less than or equal to the number of cards in your opponent's GY x 100. Each time your opponent activates a card or effect, send the top card of your opponent's deck to the GY immediately after it resolves.
915344.name: Flamiller Fangking

915345.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Flamiller Serpent". If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can add 1 "Flamiller" Spell/Trap card from your deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Flamiller Snakqueen" once per turn.
915345.name: Flamiller Snakqueen

963738.effect: This card is treated as "Flamiller Serpent" while on the field or in the GY. Activate this card by targeting 1 monster on the field; Equip this card to that monster. You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Flamiller" Ritual monster from your hand. (This is treated as a Ritual Summon.)

915358.effect: Once per turn, you can pay 500 LP to target 1 monster on the field; Equip 1 "Flamiller Serpent" from your hand or GY to the targeted monster. 915353.effect: The equipped monster loses 600 ATK. You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Flamiller" Ritual monster from your hand. (This is treated as a Ritual Summon). If this equip card is sent from the field to the GY: Send the top 3 cards of your Opponent's deck to the GY.
915353.name: Flamiller Serpent

1218064.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Flamiller Serpent". Negate the effects of all face-up monsters your opponent controls whose ATK is less than or equal to the number of cards in your opponent's GY x 100. 1225251.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Flamiller Serpent". If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can add 1 "Flamiller" Spell/Trap card from your deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Flamiller Snakqueen" once per turn.
1225251.name: Flamiller Snakqueen

1681050.effect: You can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card in your hand or on your field: Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except Machine monsters. When this card is summoned, you can target 1 "Mecha Madness" monster you control: the Levels of both that monster and this card become the combined original Levels of those 2 monsters, until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Mu" once per turn.

1681055.effect: You can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card in your hand or on your field: Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except Machine monsters. If this card is Tributed by, or to activate, the effect of a "Mecha Madness" card, you can Tribute 1 "Mecha Madness" monster in your hand. When this card is summoned, you can target 1 "Mecha Madness" monster you control: the Levels of both that monster and this card become the combined original Levels of those 2 monsters, until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Mu" once per turn.

1679829.effect: You can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card in your hand or on your field: Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except Machine monsters.If this card is Tributed by, or to activate, the effect of a "Mecha Madness" card, draw 1 card, then discard 1 card. 1679829.name: Mecha Madness - Alpha

1679916.effect: You can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card in your hand or on your field: Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except Machine monsters.If this card is Tributed by, or to activate, the effect of a "Mecha Madness" card, gain 1000 LP. 1679924.effect: You can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card in your hand or on your field: Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except Machine monsters. 1680873.effect: You can Tribute 1 other "Mecha Madness" card in your hand or on your field: Special Summon this card from your hand or GY, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot Summon monsters, except Machine monsters. If this card is Tributed by, or to activate, the effect of a "Mecha Madness" card, Special Summon a "Mecha Madness" card from your hand. When this card is summoned, target 1 "Mecha Madness" card in your GY; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Zeta" once per turn.

If this card is summoned, you can tribute this card, then Special Summon a "Mecha Madness" monster from your deck. You can only use each effect of "Mecha Madness - Omicron" once per turn.

If a "Mecha Madness" card you control is Tributed, you can discard 1 card: add a "Mecha Madness" monster from your deck to your hand. if this card is Tributed; you can discard 1 card; add 2 "Mecha Madness" cards from your deck to your hand. (This is treated as an Xyz Summon. Transfer its materials to the Summoned monster.) 2 Level 6 "Mecha Madness" Monsters
